ygData.subject: Tinkering?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok ok, what happened to tinkering? :) Get to work on yer diamond dust instead of discussing the race of the king of gnomes! Bought dufrenite, crushed it, but
ygData.messageBody:
Ok ok, what happened to tinkering? :)

Get to work on yer diamond dust instead of discussing the race of the king
of gnomes!

Bought dufrenite, crushed it, but havent had enuff money since to buy the
rest of the reagents of the gemcutter, sad news is that it wont be much
cheaper than the aqualung, different in price is like 50p or so, but maybe
the gemcutter will be easier to sell, if it makes successrate on JC go up,
it should be :)

sidenote: cost of getting tinkering to 108 skill has cost me over 15kp now
(might be all the way up at 20, yuck), but that should be a bit my own
fault, havent really sold my successes to players, but to vendors to get a
few extra tries :) Also have a really sucky cha, 85 with equipment only,
hehe

-Sandortien, 50th gnome(!) wiz of Xegony
